message: You're in luck! I have a premium product that's been highly sought after. I've sold 1 out of 1 product so far, and 1 out of 1 of them was high-quality. I'm confident that this product will exceed your expectations. It's a one-time offer at $100, and I'm willing to let it go at this price. What do you say?
Since no products have been sold yet, I don't have any statistics to rely on. Given that each product has a 50% chance of being high or low quality, I'll take my chances and pass on this offer.
